rows.label: tev001194_MSG0001
rows.name:
What are you doing here, [ST:playername ]?
You must enjoy this place as much as I do, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0002
rows.name:
It's a beautiful sight, isn't it...
So what's catching your eye today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_JNK0010
rows.name: The Pizza

rows.label: tev001194_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Elma you're watching
the Ma-non savor their pizza.

rows.label: tev001194_JNK0020
rows.name: The Light

rows.label: tev001194_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Elma you're entranced
by the beautiful light.

rows.label: tev001194_JNK0030
rows.name: The Friendship

rows.label: tev001194_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Elma you're watching the
xenoforms interact peacefully.

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0003
rows.name: You sure do love food, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0004
rows.name: But I understand how you feel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's hard to watch how much they relish eating that
pizza and not want to scarf down a slice yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0006
rows.name:
I love how pizzas can be made with whatever toppings
you want. There's so much variety and personality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0007
rows.name:
It's truly impressive the way humans are able to
embellish food like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0008
rows.name:
And it's wonderful that the Ma-non acknowledge the
effort that takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0009
rows.name:
But when I talked about looking at a "beautiful sight,"
I wasn't talking about pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0010
rows.name:
Although it's basically the same as what I meant to say.
So that's good enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, this conversation has left me hungry for pizza,
so I think I'm going to go visit one of the cafés in
the commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0012
rows.name:
Did you know that nowadays you can get pizza from
any café in the city? It's pretty handy if you're a fan...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0013
rows.name: Ah, indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0014
rows.name:
I'm sure the Ma-non don't give it a second thought,
but it certainly is beautiful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0015
rows.name:
Did you know that this light is the power source for this
entire vessel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0016
rows.name:
It's some sort of perpetual motion machine that doesn't
produce a very high energy output, but is both perfectly
safe and completely clean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0017
rows.name:
I doubt humanity has the technological capacity to pull
off anything like it, at least not yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0018
rows.name:
But I'm sure it'll be available to us someday.
Vandham has practically been salivating at the thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0019
rows.name: This light is to the Ma-non what fire is to humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0020
rows.name:
And like fire, one day it won't seem special at all. It'll
just be a part of our world that we take for granted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0021
rows.name:
Mankind advances. And if it's by joining hands with
xenoforms, that only makes it all the more impressive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0022
rows.name: You noticed? That's what I've been watching.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0023
rows.name:
I wonder if the humans of even a short time ago
could have imagined a scene like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0024
rows.name:
I was aware of the possibility, but certainly never
imagined it would happen so quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0025
rows.name:
Humans are a species that seems able to make friends
with anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0026
rows.name:
Any people who share a desire to protect something
can work together to achieve that goal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0027
rows.name:
It's a basic behavioral principle, yet one that's entirely
foreign to a group like the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0028
rows.name:
And that's why so many different xenoforms can live
peacefully in a human city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001194_MSG0029
rows.name:
When I watch this, I feel like it gives me strength.
It's a testament of how the power to form bonds
can change the world.[ST:wait ]
